document_data.name: Pressure Resistance
document_data.mainbody: '''''Pressure resistance''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s and [[wizard]]s in [[Ser√¥s]].
document_data.Effects: A caster used this spell to increase their or another individual's tolerance to underwater pressure. It allowed the recipient to swim twice as deep than normal, and survive the crushing water pressure found at these depths.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]]. Clerics required their [[holy symbol]] and wizards required a piece of cartilage from a deep sea creature.
